name: Foodify
description:
(free)

Cook garbage with a Magical Cauldron!

You found a cauldron that can turn garbage into food that is similarly shaped. For example, a light bulb can turn into an eggplant. A cogwheel can turn into a slice of bitter melon.

Collect ingredients (garbage) from the street, cook them, and sell the soup to unsuspecting customers! People are fuller and the street is cleaner, a perfect recycling game!

To turn garbage into food, you must make it collide with real food.

Garbage can turn into different food depending on the type of food it collides with.

You have three chances to 'Touch' the soup to trigger collisions.

There are characters on the edge of the street who ask for very specific soup. Help them to reveal more of the street.

Controls: Mouse input only.
